sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Incidental) Before making a non-Force power check during structured gameplay, the character may suffer 2 strain to add force dice (white d12) no greater than Force rating to the check. The character may spend force points generated during the check to perform one free Move maneuver after the check is finished. This Move maneuver may be in addition to any other maneuvers performed this turn and can allow the character to perform three maneuvers in a turn.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <name>Quick movement</name> <number>TAL0001107</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-22 04:35:16</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5d3aac38db624c542901de90cf961918</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-22 04:35:16</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
